snippet: The police are investigating whether a Norwegian citizen of Somali origin helped the Shabab militant group in planning and executing the deadly attack.
abstract: Norwegian police say they are investigating whether Norwegian citizen of Somali origin was involved in deadly siege of Westgate shopping mall in Nairobi, Kenya, in late September.

byline.contributor: Henrik Pryser Libell contributed reporting from Oslo, and Isma’il Kushkush from Khartoum, Sudan.

lead_paragraph: The police are investigating whether a Norwegian citizen of Somali origin helped the Shabab militant group in planning and executing the deadly attack.

headline.main: Norwegian Investigated in Deadly Mall Siege in Kenya
headline.print_headline: Norwegian Investigated In Mall Siege In Kenya
